User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the CineScope application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches Firebase Auth UID).

createdAt.description: Date and time the user joined.

Movie.title: Movie
Movie.description: Represents a movie in the CineScope application.

description.description: Description or synopsis of the movie.

genre.description: Genre of the movie (e.g., Action, Comedy, Drama).

imageUrl.description: URL of the movie's poster image.

Series.title: Series
Series.description: Represents a series in the CineScope application.

description.description: Description or synopsis of the series.

genre.description: Genre of the series (e.g., Action, Comedy, Drama).

endDate.description: End date of the series (null if still running).

imageUrl.description: URL of the series' poster image.

UserPreference.title: UserPreference
UserPreference.description: Represents a user's preference for a specific movie or series.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user preference.

userId.description: Reference to the User who has this preference. (Relationship: User 1:N UserPreference)

movieId.description: Reference to the Movie that the user has a preference for. Null if preference is for a Series. (Relationship: Movie 1:N UserPreference)

seriesId.description: Reference to the Series that the user has a preference for. Null if preference is for a Movie. (Relationship: Series 1:N UserPreference)

Recommendation.title: Recommendation
Recommendation.description: Represents a movie or series recommended to a user.

userId.description: Reference to the User to whom the movie or series is recommended. (Relationship: User 1:N Recommendation)

movieId.description: Reference to the Movie being recommended. Null if recommending a Series. (Relationship: Movie 1:N Recommendation)

seriesId.description: Reference to the Series being recommended. Null if recommending a Movie. (Relationship: Series 1:N Recommendation)

reason.description: Reason for the recommendation (e.g., 'Based on your liked movies', 'Trending in your area').

recommendationDate.description: Date and time when the recommendation was generated.

ViewingHistory.title: ViewingHistory
ViewingHistory.description: Represents a record of a user viewing a movie or series.

id.description: Unique identifier for the viewing history entry.

userId.description: Reference to the User who viewed the movie or series. (Relationship: User 1:N ViewingHistory)

movieId.description: Reference to the Movie that was viewed. Null if a Series was viewed. (Relationship: Movie 1:N ViewingHistory)

seriesId.description: Reference to the Series that was viewed. Null if a Movie was viewed. (Relationship: Series 1:N ViewingHistory)

viewDate.description: Date and time when the movie or series was viewed.

duration.description: The amount of time, in seconds, the content was viewed.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. Uses path-based ownership for access control.

/movies/{movieId}.description: Stores movie information. Assumes public read access or admin-managed.

/series/{seriesId}.description: Stores series information. Assumes public read access or admin-managed.

/users/{userId}/userPreferences/{userPre.description: Stores user preferences for movies and series. Uses path-based ownership for access control.

/users/{userId}/recommendations/{recomme.description: Stores movie and series recommendations for a user. Uses path-based ownership for access control.

/users/{userId}/viewingHistory/{viewingH.description: Stores the viewing history of a user for movies and series. Uses path-based ownership for access control.
